Title: Simple Command Line Backup Tool
Description:
Simple Command Line Backup Tool automates the backup of files from the command line for use in batch files.

Includes file type filters/ recursive/non recursive and number days to keep backups for.

Right now this is simply a quick app I created for a client of mine that needed a simple backup utility to go with a product I delivered.

.NET 2.0 C# Console Application 

Hopefully this will morph into a useful utility with features not common in other command line backup utilities.
